name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: linktime: Discover the best time to post on LinkedIn

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover the best time to post on LinkedIn.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
** This app is not affiliated with LinkedIn Corporation **

linktime is the only free tool designed to help you maximize your LinkedIn views with data-driven precision. Say goodbye to guesswork and embrace precision.

Why timing matters:

The LinkedIn algorithm decides within the first few minutes of your post whether it’s engaging. If too few people interact, it stops showing the post to others. 

But when you post at the optimal time (when your audience is most active), you maximize reach and engagement. linktime helps you hit that timing effortlessly.

What you can do with linktime:

- Analyze audience insights → Understand when your followers are online and ready to engage.
- Find the best posting time → Let data reveal your audience's peak activity for higher reach and engagement.
- Easily manage multiple LinkedIn accounts → Switch between accounts with one click, all from one seamless interface.

How to get started:

1. Install the linktime Chrome extension.
2. Let linktime analyze your audience activity for 24 hours.
3. Visualize your best posting times, tailored to each account.
4. Post at the suggested time for maximum reach and engagement.

Pro tip : pin the linktime extension in your Chrome toolbar for easy access.

Empower your LinkedIn strategy with linktime. No extra effort, just real results.

Need more info ? Check out our website :

https://linktime.co/
